summary.Title: Pipe fitters wanted
summary.Presentation:
We are looking for:

Pipe Fitters
Ermeto Pipe Fitters
Hydraulic Pipe Fitters
Black Pipes Fitters

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for:

  • Pipe Fitters
  • Ermeto Pipe Fitters
  • Hydraulic Pipe Fitters
  • Black Pipes Fitters

for marine industry.

Scan Con offers jobs at the Shipyards in Denmark on Reparation and New Build Departments

Key tasks:

  • Reading and interpreting blueprints, drawings, and specifications to determine the layout requirements.
  • Measuring, cutting, threading, and bending pipe to required shapes using hacksaw, pipe cutter, hammer and chisel, cutting torch and pipe cutting machine.
  • Threads pipe using threading machine.
  • Tests piping systems for leaks by increasing pressure in pipes and observing gauges attached to pipes for indication of leaks.
  • Selects type and size of pipe and related materials and equipment, such as supports, hangers, and hydraulic cylinders, according to job specifications. 
  • Securing pipes to the ship and fixtures using brackets, clamps, tools or welding equipment.
  • Attach one pipe to another in order to lengthen the run or change the flow direction in a plumbing system. 
  • Assembles and installs a variety of metal or nonmetal pipes and pipe fittings, using threaded caulked, soldering, brazen, fused, or cemented joints, and hand tools.
  • Performs other duties as required.

 Skills:

  • English - must be able to communicate in English 
  • Always attentive to detail and alert to ensure safety
  • Ability to receive and follow instructions and communicate with co-workers
  • Ability to read labels, safety warnings, and guidelines
  • Driving license is good to have but not required 

Experience:

  • Experience from shipyards 
  • Education or professional experience in a given position

We offer you:

  • Atractive salary 
  • 37 hours per week with possibilities for overtime
  • Flight ticekts
  • Transport to/ from job 
  • Accommodation 
  • Rotation 6 - 12 months 
  • Safty courses
  • Work tools and clothes
  • Help with Work Permit/VISA 
  • Health insurance / Medical help
